entry.title: 0.8.0rc1 status
entry.summary: In a conversation on Feb 9, 2013, Gavin Andresen discussed the need to fix a non-determinism problem with Windows before the final release or rc2. He suggested pulling #2286 and creating a patch to address the issue. Pieter responded that he believed #2243 would solve the problem. No further information is provided in the context.
